sentence: We had to complain twice as our room had not been refreshed by 3 pm in the afternoon despite leaving the Make Up Room light and being out of the room from 9 am
Room was clean and tidy but needs an update wall paper was peeling off the wall
A maintenance man came and repaired it but left the dirt junk in the bide without disposing of it or washing get it down2
So during our visit the lagoons the lazy river and several rides were under maintenance
Rooms are quite old requires refurbishment to keep up high level
A few restaurants were also being modernised so sometimes some restaurants were quite busy but the staff coped very well with the rush
The interior public areas and guest bedrooms could benefit from an design makeover
They are currently undergoing a refurb but this will not impact your holiday at all
The hotel should warn people in advance and should not be charging full rate for rooms close to the renovation work
The hotel is undergoing renovation and all we could hear was constant drilling and hammering particularly as we are travelling with a little one who needs to nap in the afternoon

We checked in on Tuesday coming early to enjoy our included access to Aquaventure and were delighted to find that the lounge access essentially meant that we could stay refuelled and refreshed all day
Both the rooms were recently refurbished and absolutely stunning

Arrived at the Atlantis Hotel 170918 for 10nights in a Imperial Club room this is our third time at the Atlantis our room number was 1460 and had been refurbished to a very good standard we had a great king sized bed and a balcony with chairs overlooking the waterpark
Hotel ground were beautiful Staff were wonderful Rooms need an update for that price
Overall the hotel is fantastic we requested a new refurbished room and it was stunning
the room itself was wonderful newly refurbished and beautiful
The refurbished rooms were outstanding
This hotel have been renewed in2019
Including the new upgraded renovated towers
Overall was a very good experience we got a lovely room which was recently refurbished
